verses.roman:
vaikuṇṭha beḍiyā eka āche jala-nidhi
ananta, apāra--tāra nāhika avadhi

synonyms: vaikuṇṭha—the spiritual planets of Vaikuṇṭha; beḍiyā—surrounding; eka—one; āche—there is; jala-nidhi—ocean of water; ananta—unlimited; apāra—unfathomed; tāra—of that; nāhika—no; avadhi—limitation.
translation: Surrounding Vaikuṇṭha is a mass of water that is endless, unfathomed and unlimited.
